name: ZombiED - 3D Defense
description:
An up and coming tower defense game that has a unique theme and 3D environment like no other.

The zombies are coming, W. R. Martin Memorial School is ground zero. Staff and students have been infected and it’s up to you to prevent the outbreak from turning the whole world into mindless zombies.

Use items found around the school to place deadly weapons and defend against the hordes of zombies. Fight across 13 levels of 3D mayhem in this fun-filled tower defense (TD) strategy hit from zinWorks Studios.

With over 30 unique zombies to defeat, you can play in either campaign mode, or survival mode. Just watch out for the bosses!

Do you have what it takes to stop the zombie outbreak. What are you waiting for? Play for FREE to become a hero today!

Play in Campaign mode and discover the story behind being a hero.
Want endless action? Play in Survival mode and see how long you can last.
Defeat over 30 wacky zombies using tons of unique defense towers.
If the levels are too easy for you, bump up your levels to a higher difficulty.
Move, rotate, and zoom the camera around each level with full 3D controls and visuals.
Level up your player to unlock tower upgrades.
Reach the top of the leaderboards in Survival mode to become a legend.
Earn over 90 achievements.

ZombiED is the first game from zinWorks Studios and we hope you enjoy our release. Please take a minute to leave us a review and have fun taking down the zombies we’ve filled with our own blood, sweat and tears.
